name: Labyrinth of Neferthos
description:
The riches buried ain't always the easiest to get to. Can you find all forgotten artifacts and survive to tell the tale? You have your feet and wits against traps and protectors of the old treasures.

Controls: Move with arrow keys. M = map and it can also be clicked with mouse, P = pause. Menus work with mouse. Cutscene can be skipped with standard keys.

This, our second game was also made in 8 days. We tried something different and ended up finishing with a playable game with a cool cutscene.

Bugs: Walking towards sliding wall kills you even if the door doesn't move. WebGL cutscene lags so YouTube version has been added above!
